name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the plasma source device

sn.title: Serial number
sn.description: Serial number of the plasma source device

commercial.title: Commercial product
commercial.description: Is the plasma source commercially available?

developedBy.title: Developer
developedBy.description: Name of the institution / group where the plasma source has been developed

describedBy.title: Documentation
describedBy.description: Publication or other report describing the plasma source

reflectedPower.title: Reflected power [%]
reflectedPower.description: Part of the input power which is reflected and not coupled to the electrode

voltageValue.title: Applied voltage [V]
voltageValue.description: External voltage applied to the system

pulseWidthValue.title: Pulse width [ms]
pulseWidthValue.description: Time specifying the width of the voltage pulse

riseTimeValue.title: Voltage rise time [s]
riseTimeValue.description: Time change from a specified low value (offset) to a specified high value (amplitude)

dutyCycle.title: Duty cycle [%]
dutyCycle.description: Fraction of one period in which the signal is active (on-time)

rampSymmetryValue.title: Ramp symmetry [%]
rampSymmetryValue.description: Rise time to fall time ratio

PulseMode.title: Pulse mode
PulseMode.description: Power supply mode where the voltage signal is switched between on and off mode

burstPeriodValue.title: Pulse period [ms]
burstPeriodValue.description: Time from the start of one burst to the start of next burst

feedGasFlowRateMin.title: Min. gas flow rate [slm]
feedGasFlowRateMin.description: Minimum flow rate of the feed gas in which the plasma is ignited

feedGasFlowRateMax.title: Max. gas flow rate [slm]
feedGasFlowRateMax.description: Maximum flow rate of the feed gas in which the plasma is ignited

addGasFlowRateMin.title: Min. gas admixture [sccm]
addGasFlowRateMin.description: Minimum flow rate of the gas admixture

addGasFlowRateMax.title: Max. gas admixture [sccm]
addGasFlowRateMax.description: Maximum flow rate of the gas admixture
